__TOC__

Software touched: evolution, clock-applet, hamster-applet, tomboy, tasque, weather-applet.

=== Context ===

The fisrt screen shows an analog clock, the date, the weather and the pronostic for the next three days.

Also, shows the upcoming events.

The different timezones can be added here, saving space without the map.
